Summary: Train of lighhts . one right after the other; elevation 10 degrees from horizxon.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was loooking out my top-floor window. I saw a star -like light moving in level flight from north to south, about 10 degrees in elevation from the horizon. tHEN ABOUT 10 minutes later, I saw another one. Then about 10 minuted later, another one. Then 10 minutews later, another one. They were in level flight, separated from each other. I was in shock. They moved north to south till out of view. Yhey were not blinking planes or choppers. I see them alll the time and I know what they look like. and they were bright steady lights. Like nothing I HAVE EVER seen before. and in formation but separated-like. and not satallites, or stars. They moving in a straight line, but not like a plane or jet, which I see all the time.l
